channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: February's best Australian Apple deals include up to 23% off MacBooks, AirPods, iPads and more
item.description: Looking to save some cash on some fresh Apple tech? Amazon has discounted a huge range for a limited time, so take advantage now while you can.

item.title: I review controllers for a living, and one Chinese brand remains undefeated across Switch 2, Xbox, and PC
item.description: I've reviewed countless controllers over the years, and this Chinese brand consistently outclasses almost everyone else.

item.title: Researchers Studied Work Habits in a Heavily AI-Pilled Workplace. They Sound Hellish
item.description: A case study found that workers worked at a "faster pace," on a "broader scope of tasks," and that they just worked generally more.

item.title: Lowest ever price: Save $300 on the M5 MacBook Pro in this Presidents' Day deal for photo editors
item.description: Apple’s 14-inch MacBook Pro with M5, 32GB of memory, and a 1TB SSD is down to $1,899 for President’s Day — save $300 at B&H.

item.title: The ultimate writer's toolkit: 25 gadgets and gifts to help you finish your novel
item.description: From mechanical keyboards to mug warmers, I found the best gifts and gear for writers.

item.title: New Mexico goes to trial to accuse Meta of facilitating child predators
item.description: At the center of a consequential case about social media liability is a key question: did Meta lie or mislead the public about the safety of its platform, while knowing something very different? The state of New Mexico opened its case Monday arguing that public statements by Meta's top executives regularly contradicted its own internal […]
